purpose: Provides a robust framework for developing and orchestrating AI agents with a focus on reliability and MCP support
principle: Builds on the Model Context Protocol to enable seamless integration and coordination of AI models across different use cases
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with plug-and-play components and APIs for easy integration with existing systems
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may involve incomplete features and potential stability issues
name: Upsonic
description: The most reliable AI agent framework that supports MCP.
highlight: Supports the Model Context Protocol (MCP) for enhanced agent reliability and coordination
